cookie.text: External content e.g. videos from youtube use cookies. If you want to see our website with all contents, you have to accept cookies. If you don't accept, some contents will not be shown.

cookieAlternative.text: You have not yet given permission to place the necessary cookies to view this content. Read our {privacyPolicy} for more information, and accept cookies to view this element or watch it externaly.

contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.terms: If you send us personal data entered into the contact form (fields marked with * are required for the processing of the contact) by clicking on the following button, we will process them exclusively for the intended purpose.  A disclosure to third parties does not take place unless applicable data protection regulations justify a transfer or we are legally obliged to do so. Further information on data processing as well as your legal possibilities to object can also be found in the privacy statement of this website.
contact.failure: Message could not be send. Please try again!
